alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:28PM CDT until March 30 at 5:44PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Fenton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Valley Park. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Water reaches top of boat ramp at Valley Park Public Fishing Access. Also, the Anheuser-Busch Soccer Park begins flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 24.3 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Valley Park 18.0 10.2 19.1 23.0 23.4 19.5 11.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
